2021-05-09T14:42:33Z: That was alright for a Barcelona race, wasn't it?

2021-05-09T14:37:32Z: But with Mercedes taking the initiative, that's a win for Lewis Hamilton at Barcelona!
2021-05-09T14:36:49Z: Bottas had a tilt at trying to recover the fastest lap, but fell some way short of that.

2021-05-09T14:32:13Z: But that's a 1m18.149s for Verstappen there, so the extra point may be his.

2021-05-09T14:30:50Z: Perez now has the fastest lap, a 1m19.483s.
2021-05-09T14:30:24Z: Verstappen now pits for fresh tyres, conceding defeat and going after the fastest lap point - currently held by Bottas.
2021-05-09T14:29:59Z: Russell, who had been right on the cusp of points behind Alonso, has lost a huge chunk of time and places and dropped to P15.

2021-05-09T14:24:58Z: Hamilton now brings the gap down to three seconds. He'll be on Verstappen's tail very shortly.

2021-05-09T13:50:28Z: Hamilton did a 1m21.204s last time out, and has taken another second out of Verstappen on this lap.
